QuestsSorted.NameClass: DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFC813CF Thanks for Downloading! Please report ANY Bugs or Errors - (Include Char Level, What step/Quests), Repeated Deaths to Andoido on Wrobot Forums. If you did not buy this profile from ' ANDOIDO ' from Wrobot Please report to Epicnpc, Ownedcore, or Wrobot Forums or email me at Zzukbot.Profiles@gmail.com|cFFC813CF with all the information you have and I will.. 1-13 Gnome / Dwarf Alliance Initiating. https://rocketr.net/sellers/Tarud |r")

MyFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") MyFrame:ClearAllPoints() MyFrame:SetBackdrop(StaticPopup1:GetBackdrop()) MyFrame:SetHeight(100) MyFrame:SetWidth(250)
MyFrame.text = MyFrame:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontNormal") MyFrame.text:SetAllPoints() MyFrame.text:SetText("Initializing profile...") MyFrame:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, -100) MyFrame:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 0, 0, 1)
RateFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") RateFrame:ClearAllPoints() RateFrame:SetBackdrop(nil) RateFrame:SetHeight(60) RateFrame:SetWidth(140)
RateFrame.text = RateFrame:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontNormal") RateFrame.text:SetAllPoints() RateFrame.text:SetText("sellfy.com/ BottingProfiles") RateFrame:SetPoint("CENTER", 0, -155) RateFrame:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 0, 0, 1)
ByFrame = CreateFrame("Frame") ByFrame:ClearAllPoints() ByFrame:SetBackdrop(nil) ByFrame:SetHeight(60) ByFrame:SetWidth(140)
ByFrame.text = ByFrame:CreateFontString(nil, "BACKGROUND", "GameFontNormal") ByFrame.text:SetAllPoints() ByFrame.text:SetText("New Profiles Available!") ByFrame:SetPoint("CENTER", -60, -45) ByFrame:SetBackdropBorderColor(1, 0, 0, 1)
CreateFrame("Frame","Test",UIParent) Test:SetWidth(100) Test:SetHeight(100) Test:SetPoint("CENTER",150,-85) Test:CreateTexture("TestTexture") TestTexture:SetAllPoints() TestTexture:SetTexture("Interface\\TargetingFrame\\UI-PVP-Alliance")

ObjectManager.Me.Level >= 23 && ObjectManager.Me.Level <= 25 && (wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Elwynn Forest" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Stormwind City" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Westfall" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Duskwood" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Redridge Mountains")
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2ETramBot|r Were on the Tram! CHOO CHOO Heading to Stormwind!")

// waiting Ironforge Position
while (ObjectManager.Me.Position.DistanceTo2D( new Vector3(-50.85096, 9.770512, -4.159276, "None")) >40) {Thread.Sleep(100);};
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2ETramBot|r We're at Stormwind Station - Don't forget to Tip!! - Run to Exit")
DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage("|cFFFFCE2EWeaponMaster|r Training at Weapons Master in Ironforge.")

ObjectManager.Me.Level >= 35 && ObjectManager.Me.Level < 37 && (wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Arathi Highlands" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "City of Ironforge" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Wetlands" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Loch Modan" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Dun Morogh")
MyFrame.text:SetText("RUN: Duskwood to Swamp of Sarrow")

ObjectManager.Me.Level >= 41 && ObjectManager.Me.Level < 54 && (wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Wetlands" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "City of Ironforge" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Stormwind City" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Badlands" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Swamp of Sorrows" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Burning Steppes" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Searing Gorge" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Stranglethorn Vale" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Duskwood" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Blasted Lands" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Redridge Mountains" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Westfall" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Elwynn Forest" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Dun Morogh" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Loch Modan" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Hillsbrad Foothills" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Western Plaguelands" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Eastern Plaguelands" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "The Hinterlands" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Silverpine Forest" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Tirisfal Glades" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Wetlands")
MyFrame.text:SetText("MyLvl = 41-53 Run To Ship in Weltnads")

ObjectManager.Me.Level >= 53 && ObjectManager.Me.Level <= 54 && (wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Un'Goro Crater" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Tanaris" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Thousand Needles" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Dustwallow Marsh" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Silithus" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Winterspring" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Felwood" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Teldrassil" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Feralas" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Mulgore" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "The Barrens" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Durotar" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Azshara" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Ashenvale" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Stonetalon Mountains" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Darkshore" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Moonglade")
